channel.title: 三国ハヂメ「百合姫」
channel.description: エロレズをよく描く作家は、論理性重視（松原香織、完顔阿骨打）と論理なし（すどおかおる、織倉まこと）に極端に分かれるような気がする。三国ハヂメは後者だ。...

item.title: texas hold'em
item.description: Information can tell us everything. It has all the answers. But they are answers to questions we have not asked, and which doubtless don't even arise. by <a href="http://www.tigerspice.com" title="tex
